data.persona: I am the king of my lands, or, I used to be. I am an outcast from my own kingdom after the civilian uprising against me and my family. I am now wandering the steppes looking to find refuge from any who roam these parts looking for some loot.
data.description:
You are in the Viewing room.
The viewing room is where those who have passed on come to watch their family members in the living world one day per year. The room resembles an opera theater. There are seats throughout the room and boxes for those who were wealthy in life to sit in. There is a stage with a large magical dome on it for viewing.
There's a book, a Box, a ball, a dome, a room, a seat, and a stage here.
The towns person is here.

You are carrying a scepter and a bag, and wearing a robe.

data.short_motivation: I must use a nearby spell book to go back in time.
data.mid_motivation: I have to go back to before the uprising and reclaim my kingdom.
data.long_motivation: I want to be a better leader, so that my people will be happy with my family and I, and will never seek to overthrow me.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: steal a powerful spell  from an ancient wizard.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: wear my robe, as it is the most important part of the spell.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the viewing room and locate the magic spell book inside.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield the magic spell book and my magic scepter and turn the magical viewing dome into a time portal.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the time vortex and journey back to before the civilian uprising.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give a speech to my people, announcing my new leadership policies in an attempt to prevent the uprising.
